overview: Please Be Gentle: Alice (Paige Owens), a virgin teenager is seduced by Raymond (Tommy Pistol), the father of a bully, after the latter intervenes to save her following a bad prank around the pool. Alice wants to be the center of attention for once because of something positive. Their Wicked Ways: A repressed family slowly succumbs to lust and sin when Hannah (Kyler Quinn), Bethany (Elexis Monroe), and John (John Strong) had sex all together. Hannah isn't their biological daughter and she wants to explore newfound feelings.
title: Please Be Gentle
